code: import{Alert,Button,Snackbar,Stack}from'@mui/material';import React,{useState}from'react';import{BookService}from'../app/services/services/BookService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookActions=_ref=>{let{bookId,isBorrowed,canApproveReturn}=_ref;const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[message,setMessage]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[open,setOpen]=useState(false);const handleAction=async action=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);setMessage(null);try{if(action==='borrow'){await BookService.borrowBook(bookId);setMessage('Book borrowed successfully!');}else if(action==='return'){await BookService.returnBorrowBook(bookId);setMessage('Return request sent!');}else if(action==='approveReturn'){await BookService.approveReturnBorrowBook(bookId);setMessage('Return approved!');}}catch(err){var _err$body;setError((err===null||err===void 0?void 0:(_err$body=err.body)===null||_err$body===void 0?void 0:_err$body.message)||'Action failed');}finally{setLoading(false);setOpen(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"row",spacing:2,sx:{mt:2},children:[!isBorrowed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:()=>handleAction('borrow'),disabled:loading,children:"Borrow"}),isBorrowed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",onClick:()=>handleAction('return'),disabled:loading,children:"Return"}),canApproveReturn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",onClick:()=>handleAction('approveReturn'),disabled:loading,children:"Approve Return"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Snackbar,{open:open,autoHideDuration:4000,onClose:()=>setOpen(false),children:error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"error",onClose:()=>setOpen(false),children:error}):message?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"success",onClose:()=>setOpen(false),children:message}):undefined})]});};export default BookActions;
